title: Mixed-Methods Research Workshop for Online Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of pedagogy and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Participants analyze and improve core elements (learner expectations, support systems, motivation, content design) of online teacher professional development programs using mixed research methods

learning_goals: Designing evaluation tools for teacher professional development programs using mixed research methods (quantitative/qualitative)
Proposing online professional development modules that include learner support systems and motivation strategies
Developing team-based content design frameworks applicable to educational settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
